meta.description: Oman Air First and Business Class Lounge at Suvarnabhumi Airport (BKK), Concourse E. Learn more about the lounge: amenities, photos, review, opening hours, location.

lounge.name: Oman Air First and Business Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: Proceed down to the 3nd Floor at the junction between Concourse G and E, follow signs to the entrance.

location.description: Bang Phli, Samut Prakan, Bangkok, Thailand

lounge.description: The Oman Air First and Business Class Lounge offers an oasis of calm, serenity, and exceptional comfort, ensuring a relaxing start to your journey that reflects the outstanding hospitality you will enjoy on board the aircraft.

general: One child under 7 years admitted free per adult.
Business Center is subject to payment.
warning: Alcoholic drinks are only available to passengers 20 years of age or older.
This lounge is currently undergoing refurbishment works until further notice. The lounge will remain open during this time and disruption kept to a minimum.

reviews.content: Staff stand around like guards as if to monitor you...weird, food selection Middle East cuisine and good, drinks good, lounge too small. Skip this one and head to a Turkish.
Best Priority Pass Lounge in Bangkok. Nice and classy atmosphere and comfortable seating. Food selection is limited (2 warm dishes, Arabian Mezze) but alcohol is really good! Real champagne!
The food is delicious! The wine so-so. Very good place.
There is a pretty decent variety of alcohol, food was very delicious (you can choose from seafood, meat, cheese, deserts, fruits etc), food was replenished immediately, comfy atmosphere.
Closed 8pm Monday. Should be open 24 hours.
Best lounge in Bangkok. Has only 1 shower but this is very clean. Nice seating area. Easy to relax here.
Very bad, small and lot of people. Nothing premium.
Definitely nicer than the Thai lounges close by.  Very clean with friendly service. Always a few hot dishes as well.
This is rated fresh but better than most lounges in Bangkok, opening hours are wrong as well, this lounge is open all day. Very classy, but small, though quiet. Considering Oman has 2 flts, not bad.
Small lounge, few choices of food but the place is quiet and cozy. The staff is on top of the cleanliness and are continuously picking up the empty plates.
Nice quiet lounge with good food selection and some top shelf liquor, including single malt scotch and champagne - all self service. Worth a visit if your departing E gates.
Really nice breakfast selection. Very quiet at 6:30 in the morning. Comfy chairs. Peaceful.
Good lounge if you have a quick layover in BKK! Decent food, clean shower, pretty empty.
This is everything you’d want from a lounge before a flight. Not a ton of food but the drinks are self serve and varied. Bathroom in lounge is nice.
Good lounge, just bit small, however good service.
Wow, compared to the Thai Lounges this is heaven!
Nice lounge, clean and comfy with a decent selection of food and drinks. Didn’t get a chance to check out the others lounges around but was happy with this one.
Nice, quiet and super comfortable lounge in concourse E. Decent line of food and drinks! Worth checking this out!
Fantastic and the best for Priority Pass holders, ironic when flying Emirates. Fantastic food and Chandon Rose Champagne - ensure you request the chocolate cake!!
Tried different lounges in BKK and always end at Oman. Comfy, great service, food and drinks.
In 2022 still the best option in BKK. Good food, good drinks, good service, quiet, comfy, toilets, shower. Way better than nearby Miracle first class.
Great food and drinks.  Full bar and all food is halal. The major downside is there are very limited power points.
Quiet, comfortable although 2.5hr limit.
Surprisingly decent, several hot food options plus Middle Eastern treats. Well stocked bar and a Nespresso. A tad dark and no view, but not a problem. Comfy and quiet.
Very comfortable place to be. staff always have smiles and they clean the shower between every use. Great place to go and chill out for a few hours between flights!
Quiet comfortable and new. Great service, very attentive staff. Nice choice of hot and cold food and open bar.
Quiet, clean, provide hummus & beer. All a boy needs for a layover.  There are two curtain-offable zones for sleeping if you're lucky. Honestly though, Miracle First/Business on D are better now.
This Lounge is a nice and clean but small lounge with limited food on the menu. It has a nice atmosphere and is good to spend a few hours. It has good seating. I would recommend the lounge.
Small but comfortable. Nice shower. Staff friendly and not intrusive. Limited food but quality acceptable. Nice selection of alcohols. Simple self serve set up.
I discovered this lounge thanks to LoungeBuddy and made my wait between flights very comfortable. An improvement I would suggest is having more USB chargers around.
Very basic lounge. Expected more from Oman Air.
Quiet and modern, with lovely decor. Breakfast options okay, a few hot dishes, plus lots of fruit and yogurt options.
Great modern lounge. One of the best for Priority Pass access. Good drink and food selection.
Nice lounge and pretty empty at 10:30am. Front desk discouraged me from entering, saying Air France was larger but otherwise service was nice. Decent food spread but not worth a detour too far.
